name: Shipbreaker Reset
description:
Made for the 2021 IndieGalactic Space Jam!

Wake up from your hangover, explore the cruise ship, collect the 14 killswitch keys to pacify the automated defenses.

Team:
Angel R - Systems Programming, Tools (Narrative, level design) Programming 
Ben A - Lead Level Design, UI Design, Procedural Animation, Animation Integration
Dennis G - Level Design, Production
Mitch S - 3D Art, Rigging, Animation, Cut Scene Animation, 3D Character Art, General 3D Art, Texturing, UI Art
Ryan S - Music/SFX Creation, VO, Audio Engineering 
Trey A - 3D Art, Production, VO, Video Editing
